items.headline: A recent college grad asks: How do I compete with AI to get a job in finance?
items.summary_en: For finance majors specifically, many of the tasks associated with entry-level jobs are being automated. But if you start seeing AI as a tool instead of a hurdle, you might have more success on your job hunt.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: The biggest winners of the Taylor Swift-Travis Kelce podcast
items.summary_en: After years of speculation, Taylor Swift will finally appear on Travis and Jason Kelce’s podcast “New Heights,” in an episode that is scheduled to be released on Wednesday.

items.headline: I’m a senior who barely survives on $1,300 a month. No way could I live on $1,000.

items.headline: Stock market rally on hot CPI print is indicative of market strength, declares strategist Tom Lee

items.headline: Chris Pratt and Katherine Schwarzenegger relist luxury L.A. home for $20 million
items.summary_en: The couple have put their sprawling Pacific Palisades, Calif., mansion back on the market with a significant price cut, and are said to be renting a home from Katy Perry.
